DAY1.Breakfast: 1/2 cup oats cooked in 1/2 cup each 2% milk and water,1 medium plum, chopped,4 walnut halves, chopped,Top oats with plum and walnuts.
DAY1.Lunch: Turkey & Apple Cheddar Melt, 2 slices whole-wheat bread,2 tsp. whole-grain mustard, divided1/2 medium apple, sliced, 2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided,1 cup mixed greens,Top one slice of bread with 1 tsp. mustard, apple, turkey and 1 Tbsp. cheese. Top the other slice of bread with the remaining 1 tsp. mustard and 1 Tbsp.cheese. Toast sandwich halves face-up in a toaster oven until the cheese begins to melt and bubble. Add the mixed greens to the sandwich just before serving,Look for a deli turkey with less than 150 mg sodium per 1-ounce serving.
DAY1.Dinner: 2 1/2 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup, 1 serving Rosemary-Goat Cheese Toast,Make Ahead Tip: Save 1 3/4 cups soup for Lunchon DAY2, and another 2 cups for Lunchon DAY6.

DAY2.Breakfast: 1 serving Everything Bagel Avocado Toast,1/2 cup blueberries,25 pistachios
DAY2.Lunch: 1 3/4 cups Vegetable Weight-Loss Soup,2 slices whole-wheat baguette (cut ¼ inch thick)
DAY2.Snacks: 1 reg juice of orange plus 15g peanuts
DAY2.Dinner: 2 1/2 cups Lentil & Roasted Vegetable Salad with Green Goddess Dressing,1 serving Frozen Chocolate-Banana Bites, to enjoy after dinner

DAY3.Breakfast: 1 serving Yogurt with Blueberries & Honey, 1 tsp. ground flaxseed, 6 walnut halves, chopped or whole,Add flaxseed to yogurt for an added boost of fiber and omega-3s. Top with chopped walnuts, or leave the walnuts whole to have on the side.
DAY3.Lunch: 3 1/2 cups Mixed Greens with Lentils & Sliced Apple
DAY3.Dinner: 1 1/3 cups Chicken Sausage & Peppers,1/2 cup cooked brown rice,1/2 tsp. extra-virgin olive oil,1/2 tsp. no-salt-added Italian seasoning, Salt to taste,Season rice with oil, Italian seasoning and salt. Serve chicken, sausage & peppers over the rice,1 1/2 cups mixed greens, 1/4 cup shredded carrot, 1/4 cup sliced cucumbers, 1 Tbsp. Garlic-Oregano Vinaigrette, or a premade Italian salad dressing,Combine greens, carrot, cucumber and vinaigrette.
DAY3.Snacks: Drink water a half hour before dinner

DAY4.Breakfast: 1/2 cup oats cooked in 1/2 cup each 2% milk and water, 1 tsp. ground flaxseed, 1 medium plum, chopped, 3 walnut halves, chopped,Mix oatmeal and flaxseed; top with plum and walnuts.
DAY4.Lunch: 1 serving Veggie & Hummus Sandwich, 3 dried apricots
DAY4.Dinner: 1 serving Lemon-Herb Salmon with Caponata & Farro
DAY4.Note:: If you don't have farro? You can substitute another whole grain you have on hand, like brown rice.

DAY5.Breakfast: 1 serving Everything Bagel Avocado Toast,20 cherries
DAY5.Lunch: Turkey & Pear Pita Melt 1/2 large whole-wheat pita round (save the other half for Lunchon DAY7),3 1/2 oz. low-sodium deli turkey,1/2 medium pear, sliced, 2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup mixed greens,1 medium plum
DAY5.Dinner: 1 serving Spaghetti Squash & Meatballs, 1 slice whole-wheat baguette (cut 1/4 inch thick), toasted,1/2 Tbsp. goat cheese, 1/4 tsp. fresh chopped rosemary,Toast baguette and top with cheese and rosemary.

DAY6.Breakfast: 1 serving Yogurt with Blueberries & Honey, 2 tsp. ground flaxseed, 5 walnut halves, chopped,Mix yogurt and flaxseed. Serve topped with walnuts.
DAY6.Dinner: 1 serving Apple-Glazed Chicken with Spinach,1/2 cup Steamed Butternut Squash,2 tsp. extra-virgin olive oil,1/2 tsp. fresh thyme or 1/8 tsp. dried,Salt and pepper to taste,Toss squash with oil and thyme. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

DAY7.Breakfast: 2 Blueberry-Pecan Pancakes,3 Tbsp. blueberries, fresh or frozen,2 tsp. ground flaxseed,Microwave blueberries until soft and sauce-like, about 1 minute. Stir in the flaxseed for an extra fiber kick, and serve with the pancakes.
DAY7.Lunch: 2 cups mixed greens,1/2 cup sliced cucumber,1/4 cup grated carrot,1 1/2 Tbsp. Garlic-Oregano Vinaigrette, or a premade Italian salad dressing,1/2 large whole-wheat pita round, toasted1/4 cup hummus
DAY7.Dinner: 1 serving Mushroom-Sauced Pork Chops, 1/2 cup cooked brown rice,3/4 cup Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Sun-Dried Tomato Pesto

DAY8.Breakfast: 1 cup nonfat plain yogurt• 1 / 2 cup blueberries / cherries• 1 1 / 2 Tbsp.slivered almonds• 2 tsp.honeyTop yogurt with blueberries almonds and honey.
DAY8.Dinner: 1 serving Grilled fish with pinch of salt• 1 serving Paprika - Herb Rubbed Chicken

DAY9.Lunch: 1 cup of stawberries, 2 slices whole grain bread 300 gram tuna(baam fish) 1 slice low - fat mozzarella cheese 1 Tbsp.olive oil mayo.
DAY9.Dinner: 400 grams.grilled chicken 1 medium baked potato 1 - 1 / 2 cups green beans(peas).
